chapters.title: Chapter 48: Reading the Commentary
chapters.info: Sajius, p. 742—Author of the book Commentary on the Dragon, a book which Min is reading. His book contains the line, “He shall hold a blade of light in his hands, and the three shall become one.” The traditional interpretation of this line is that Rand will wield Callandor and unite three kingdoms under him. Min thinks, however, that this refers to the fact that Callandor must be wielded by a circle of three—one man and two women.
